## Classes

### r_role::fact_classified

R_role::Fact_classified

Classify a system based on the presence of custom fact `role`

### r_role::lb::haproxy

R_role::Lb::haproxy

A load balancer provided by HA Proxy

### r_role::monitor::nagios_server

R_role::Monitor::Nagios_server

A nagios monitoring server

### r_role::puppet::master

R_role::Puppet::Master

An bigger and better puppet master with built-in support for a base profile,
autosigning, heira/eyaml and the most popular agent installers

### r_role::puppet::master_git

Role::Puppet::Master_git

A fully featured puppet master that includes a small built-in git server to
get you started

### r_role::puppet::master_minimal

R_role::Puppet::Master_minimal

A Puppet Master server that applies a base profile to give some creature
comforts

### r_role::trusted_fact_classified

R_role::trusted_fact_classified

Classify a system based on the presence of the trusted fact `pp_role`. If the
role class specified does not exist, then include the base profile instead and
print a warning message to the client. If no `pp_role` is set, then just
include the base profile.

* **See also**
https://forge.puppet.com/geoffwilliams/includable

#### Examples

##### Assigning this role to all unclaimed nodes in `site.pp`

```puppet
node default {
  include r_role::trusted_fact_classified
}

# Alternatively, create a single group in the Puppet Enterprise Node
# Classifier and assign this class to it.
```

##### Hiera data for selecting a different fallback (base) role

```puppet
r_role::trusted_fact_classified::base_role_class: 'role::disable_vm'
```

##### Hiera data to disable printing a warning message when pp_role class missing

```puppet
r_role::trusted_fact_classified::warning: false
```

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `r_role::trusted_fact_classified` class.

##### `base_role_class`

Data type: `String`

The fallback role to use if no `pp_role` is
set/avaiable

Default value: "r_role::base"

##### `warning`

Data type: `Boolean`

If requested class does not exist we will print a warning
message informing the operator of this unless this parameter is set `false`

Default value: `true`

### r_role::web_service::asp_server

R_role::Web_service::Asp_server

Deploy ASP, IIS and a user-defined website from Git on windows

### r_role::web_service::iis

R_role::Web_service::Iis

Configure the IIS Web Server on windows

### r_role::web_service::jenkins

R_role::Web_server::Jenkins

Deploy a Jenkins CI server

### r_role::web_service::lamp_server

R_role::Web_service::Lamp_server

Deploy an entire LAMP stack (Linux Apache, MySQL, PHP)+ base profile.  Also
deploys a user-defined PHP webapp from git, so can be used for end-to-end
deployment

### r_role::web_service::tomcat

R_role::Web_service::Tomcat

Deploy a tomcat application server

### r_role::webapp::geoserver

R_role::Webapp::Geoserver

Install GeoServer, a Java/web based GIS

### r_role::webapp::wordpress

R_role::Webapp::Wordpress

Install WordPress, a LAMP/web based CMS

### role::base

A base (SOE) role that just includes the profile of same name
